snippet: The tenor Damien Top and the pianist Linda Hall performed works by Massenet as part of the New York Chamber Music Festival.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews performance by tenor Damien Top and pianist Linda Hall at Symphony Space to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the death of composer Jules Massenet; concert is part of the New York Chamber Music Festival.
lead_paragraph: The tenor Damien Top and the pianist Linda Hall performed works by Massenet as part of the New York Chamber Music Festival.

headline.seo: Damien Top and Linda Hall at Symphony Space
headline.main: With a Composer as Your Umbrella
headline.print_headline: With a Composer as Your Umbrella
